item.description: Clearing your Path for Success with Joanna Scaparotti     Being a successful practitioner boils down to one thing only. Successful practitioners have authenticity. They are clear about the purpose of their practice, what they do best, what they can do for their clients and who they do it for.  Knowing how to access your inner voice and intuition is the fastest way to transform your business so it's profitable and fulfilling. Joanna will present her techniques and lead an exercise for accessing your heart and getting clarity for your business.   We have a potluck from 11:30 - 12:30 pm with the presentation from 12:30 - 1:30 pm.   RSVP with what you will bring to the potluck. $10 meetup fee.
item.name: March Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup: Clearing Your Path to Success
